Postdoctoral Fellows.name: Anouchka Laurent, Ph.D.
Postdoctoral Fellows.description: Dr. Laurent is a postdoctoral fellow working on PTCL in the Palomero Lab

Postdoctoral Fellows.name: Laura Quevedo, Ph.D.
Postdoctoral Fellows.description: Dr. Quevedo is a postdoctoral fellow in the Palomero Lab, working on implementing multi-omic and single-cell analysis to study PTCL using murine models and human samples

Postdoctoral Fellows.name: Ruth Alonso Alonso, Ph.D.
Postdoctoral Fellows.description: Dr. Alonso is a postdoctoral fellow working on PTCL in the Palomero Lab

Instructors.name: Dr. Wen-Hsuan Lin, M.D., Ph.D.
Instructors.description: Dr. Wen-Hsuan Lin is a hematopathologist and physician-scientist in the Department of Pathology and Cell Biology working on PTCL in the Palomero Lab

Students.name: Kalay Bertulfo, M.S.
Students.description: Kalay Bertulfo is a Ph.D. student with the Department of Biology working on PTCL in the Palomero Lab

Research Staff.name: Hannah Miller, B.S.
Research Staff.description: Hannah is the Palomero lab manager and a research technician

Past Members.name: Bobby Shih, Ph.D.
Past Members.description: Bobby Shih received his Ph.D. from the Integrated Cellular, Molecular and Biomedical Studies Program at Columbia University working on PTCL in the Palomero Lab
